subtask:
(1) Move to the stove.
(2) Grasp the saucepot.
(3) Put the carrot into the saucepot.
(4) Put the saucepot back onto the stove.
(5) Cook the carrot.
code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Put the carrot into the saucepot.
    carrot = registry(env,"carrot_151")
    saucepot = registry(env,"saucepot_150")
    put_inside(robot, carrot, saucepot)
    donothing(env)
